title: Terraformer
summaries: The Terraformer is a post-Moon Lord tool. It is obtained by throwing a Clentaminator into Shimmer after the Moon Lord has been defeated. It has the same effects as a Clentaminator but reaches 95 tiles and has a width of 7 tiles and has a 33% chance to not consume Solutions, compared to the Clentaminator which reaches 60 tiles and has a width of 5 tiles.

statistics.Tooltip:
Creates and destroys biomes when sprayed
Uses colored solution
33% chance to save ammo
statistics.Sell: 40
